Module RMA
Package RMA

Class LoginModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMA.LoginModel
  • public class LoginModel
extends java.lang.Object
    LoginModel contains the fields necessary to represent the model for the Login form.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty db
      db contains the value for the RMA database name.
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> instances
      instances contains the SQL Server instances found on the network.
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty pass
      pass contains the user's entered password.
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty role
      role contains the user's resulting role in the RMA database (admins, analysts, or engineers).
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty selectedInstance
      selectedInstance contains the user's currently selected instance on the Login form.
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty user
      user contains the user's entered username.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LoginModel()
      The default constructor for LoginModel initializes the fields with empty values, and then searches the network for listening SQL Server instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getDB()
      getDB returns the String stored in db.
      private void getInstances()
      getInstances issues a request to any listening SQL Server Browser Service on default UDP port 1434 for their information of running instances, and any that respond are added to the list of instances in the format HOSTNAME\INSTANCE_NAME.
      java.lang.String getPass()
      getPass returns the String stored in pass.
      java.lang.String getSelectedInstance()
      getSelectedInstance returns the String that the user selected from instances.
      java.lang.String getUser()
      getUser returns the String stored in user.
      javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> instancesProperty()
      instancesProperty returns the ObservableList containing the list of instances found on the network.
      javafx.beans.property.StringProperty passProperty()
      passProperty returns the StringProperty field containing the user's password.
      javafx.beans.property.StringProperty selectedInstanceProperty()
      selectedInstanceProperty returns the StringProperty containing the user's selected instance.
      void setRole​(java.lang.String newRole)
      setRole sets the value of role to the user-provided newRole parameter.
      javafx.beans.property.StringProperty userProperty()
      userProperty returns the StringProperty field containing the user's username.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        role contains the user's resulting role in the RMA database (admins, analysts, or engineers). (Requirement 1.3)

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoginModel

        public LoginModel()
        The default constructor for LoginModel initializes the fields with empty values, and then searches the network for listening SQL Server instances.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstances

        private void getInstances()
        getInstances issues a request to any listening SQL Server Browser Service on default UDP port 1434 for their information of running instances, and any that respond are added to the list of instances in the format HOSTNAME\INSTANCE_NAME. If no hosts respond, an error message is shown and the program exits.

      • getUser

        public java.lang.String getUser()
        getUser returns the String stored in user.
        Returns:
        The String value stored in the user field.

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty userProperty()
        userProperty returns the StringProperty field containing the user's username.
        Returns:
        The StringProperty user field.

        public java.lang.String getPass()
        getPass returns the String stored in pass.
        Returns:
        The String stored in pass.

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty passProperty()
        passProperty returns the StringProperty field containing the user's password.
        Returns:
        The StringProperty pass field.

      • setRole

        public void setRole​(java.lang.String newRole)
        setRole sets the value of role to the user-provided newRole parameter.
        Parameters:
        newRole - The role (admin, analyst, or engineer) to store.

      • instancesProperty

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> instancesProperty()
        instancesProperty returns the ObservableList containing the list of instances found on the network.
        Returns:
        The ObservableList instances field.

        public java.lang.String getSelectedInstance()
